signUpComponent.tellUsAboutYou: Tell us a little about yourself
signUpComponent.userNameRequired: Username is required and has a minimun length of 6 characters
signUpComponent.emailRequired: Email is required and must be in a valid format
signUpComponent.passwordRequired: Password must have a minimum of 8 characters, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
signUpComponent.rePasswordRequired: Password confirmation is required and passwords must match
signUpComponent.thanksForJoining: Thank you for joining us! We have sent a confirmation email to the email address provided during registration. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to complete the registration process.

feedComponent.addChildrenText: Associate children to your profile to have a personalized recommendation for each one of them!

searchComponent.placeholder: Search for a movie or TV show

resetPassword.title: Password reset
resetPassword.emailLabel: Provide the email associated with your account to reset your password.
resetPassword.emailSent: A reset code has been sent to the provided email. Enter the code and your new password in the form below.
resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset successfully.

selectReportReason: Select a reason for this report
genericError: There was an error while trying to perform this action. Please try again later.
